Package com.alvermont.terraj.stargen.ui

Contains code for the Swing user interface for Stargen.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AboutBoxDialog The about box for the planet UI program
DetailsFrame Displays a tabbed details view of a solar system, one planet per tab.
DetailsFromTemplate Handles turning planet details into text using a template
KeyDialog Displays the key to planetary data
PlanetDetailsPanel Displays detailed information for one planet
PrintHTMLDialog A print preview dialog box for the HTML document
StargenFrame The main frame for the Stargen user interface
SystemFrame Displays the details of a solar system
TemplateTest This is a test of the FreeMarker template system to evaluate it for use with this project.
UIUtils Some utility functions useful to the UI
 

Package com.alvermont.terraj.stargen.ui Description

Contains code for the Swing user interface for Stargen.
